sense.name: Allow free rein to enjoyment
sense.examples: The writer indulged in metaphorical language. Throughout the lecture, he indulged in obscene gestures that left the audience baffled. Don't indulge the students' behavior! Grandparents often indulge the children over holiday periods. Don't indulge the students. She indulges in ice cream sometimes three times a day. Those who often indulged in fatty meats did not have a significantly higher risk of prostate cancer.
